sentences.sContent: a rock band with a distinctive sound
...and the distinctive traits were problem-solving ingenuity and realistic lifestyle applications...
...with their distinctive character—where life is stable and intensely human—are disappearing...
...rich in sensory detail and emotional and moral complexity-is a distinctive experience...
...The effect of policies generating long-term resource concentration has also created a distinctive set of universities which are research-led and commercially active...

words.tran: 明显的；独特的；清楚的；有区别的
区别；差别；特性；荣誉、勋章

trans.tranOther: having a special quality, character, or appearance that is different and easy to recognize
